attributes.additional_details:
NAT WEST ARE WANTING TO START CHARGING ALL ACCOUNT HOLDERS A FIXED £6 FEE(MONTHLY) FOR UTILIZING CUSTOMERS WHO GO INTO THEIR OVERDRAFT FACILITY. THESE OVERDRAFTS IN MOST CASES HAVE BEEN GIVEN FREELY BY THE BANK-THEN WHEN THEY HAVE ENOUGH CLIENTS IN THE RED, THEY ARE GOING TO START CHARGING £6 PLUS INTEREST.
THIS IS MORALLY WRONG - THEY HAVE GIVEN YOU SOMETHING FOR FREE, NOW THEY WANT TO CHARGE YOU FOR IT!!!!
